short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Google algorithm update data to your search console. Created by V Digital Marketing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add Google Algorithm Updates Data to Your Search Console Dashboard.

Tired of manually tracking Google algorithm updates? Our extension simplifies your SEO workflow by seamlessly integrating the latest algorithm update information directly into your Google Search Console dashboard.

How it Works:

Install: Easily install our extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Log In: Sign in to your Google Search Console account as usual.
Real-Time Updates: Our extension automatically fetches the most recent Google algorithm update dates.
Visual Insights: Clear indicators and notifications highlight potential algorithm impacts on your website's performance.


Key Benefits:

Proactive SEO: Stay informed about algorithm changes and adapt your strategy accordingly.
Quick Identification: Easily spot potential algorithm penalties and take immediate action.
Data-Driven Decisions: Make informed choices based on real-time data and insights.
Time-Saving: Automate the process of tracking algorithm updates.
Elevate Your SEO Strategy Today:

Don't let Google algorithm updates catch you off guard. Install our extension and gain a competitive edge.
